sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit{ type:string ="password"; eyeIcon:string="fa-eye-slash"; constructor(){} ngOnInit():void{ } hideShowPass(){ if(this.type =="password"){ this.type="text"; this.eyeIcon="fa-eye"; }else{ this.type="password"; this.eyeIcon="fa-eye-slash"; } } }
